content:
UC IRVINE - ICS 125 PROJECT IN SYSTEM DESIGN

ASSIGNMENTS

Homework 1: Individual Web Page, Due Wednesday, October 3, 1998

Assignment 1: Project Bid, beginning in class, Monday, October 8, 2001

Homework 2: Team Web Page, Due Wednesday, October 17, 2001

Assignment 2: Requirements

Assignment 3: Prototype, Scheduled Demonstration in lieu of a Midterm

Assignment 4: Design

Assignment 5: Final Demonstration, Scheduled During Finals Week

Ongoing Homework: Team Logs

ICS125 FQ01
David F. Redmiles -- Home Page
Department of Information and Computer Science
University of California, Irvine CA 92717-3425
